article: Dear friend, I am  _  American school girl. My name is Alice Green. I am twelve. I  have  two brothers. My brothers and I  _  all at school. We go to school  _  Monday  _  Friday. We  _  have classes on  _  and Sunday. We don't go to school on weekends. My father and my mother are teachers. They say China is great. I like  singing  , and I can sing a lot of songs. My brother and I like baseball and basketball.  _  do you like? Let's  _  friends. Please write soon. Yours, Alice Green
